channel.title: ELEVATION GAMING [Survival] [24/7] [Dedicated Staff] [Towny] [Multiverse]
channel.description:
[b]IP:108.61.28.34:25571[/b]
Elevation Gaming is a dedicated survival server with a very helpful staff and a close community. We have contests every week with prizes like getting VIP status for a month. We have Towny, Multiverse and many more plugins to enhance game play. We are still growing, so join while you can!
What we have to offer: 99.9% up time 24 Slots Dedicated Staff Multiple worlds: Survival, creative, contest Website Forum: www.elevationgaming.com
For more information and photos go to: http://www.planetminecraft.com/server/elevation-gaming/
